GSD.description:
ALSA: oss: Fix PCM OSS buffer allocation overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.18 by commit fb08bf99195a87c798bc8ae1357337a981faeade. For more details please see the references link.
